DOC.brief_summary: A randomised , crossover , multicentre , national , clinical trial compare efficacy corifollitropin alfa versus daily recombinant FSH HMG control ovarian stimulation woman poor ovarian response undergo IVF treatment . The main objective study compare number oocyte obtain follicle puncture use two stimulation protocol . Only poor responder accord Bologna criterion recruit trial . All participant undergo two stimulation cycle obtain accumulate oocyte vitrification . One cycle do corifollitropin alfa protocol daily rFSH HMG , order application protocol randomise ( crossover clinical trial ) patient .
DOC.brief_title: Corifollitropin Alfa Versus Daily rFSH Controlled Ovarian Stimulation Poor Responders
DOC.criteria: Advanced maternal age ( ≥40 year ) A previous poor ovarian response ( ≤3 oocytes conventional stimulation protocol ) An abnormal ovarian reserve test ( i.e . antral follicle count < 57 follicle antimullerian hormone level < 0.51.1 ng/ml )
